title: Looking to BUY the following T206 in SGC 3 - SGC 40/3
author: Tim Kindler

posts.post_title: Looking to BUY the following T206 in SGC 3 - SGC 40/3
posts.post_content:
*Looking to purchase one or all of the following T206 from fellow board members in SGC 3 - SGC 40/3 condition.   

*Looking for the more common backs- Sweet Caporal, Piedmont, and Polar Bear for a smaller premium.

*Can't get to a Card Show right now, so hoping the card show would come to me.

*Looking to pay with a Money Order or check, and fair current market values.

*Thanks for any help on my MONSTER project you might be able to provide me.  Currently at 333 T206s.

*Please private message me with prices and we can hopefully work something out and I could get scans to my email.

*Thanks, Tim Kindler

Adkins
Ames - Hands at Chest
Ball- Cleveland 
Ball- New York
Beck
Becker
Blackburne
Bradley- With Bat
Burch-Fielding
Burchell
Camnitz- Hands over Head
Carrigan
JJ Clarke
Harry Davis- DAVIS on front
Red Dooin

*******If you have other SGC 3- SGC 40/3 commons available for sale other than those listed, please PM me a list and prices....I may need some of those too, just didn't want to list too many because if some one had the 100 or so commons I still need I wouldn't be able to afford them ALL right now. :)******
